name: Play Ball
description:
Play as a baseball player training at night before the big game. Master the bat's controls to hit a home run and score one for the team.

Controls: Mouse left/right to swing bat around player, [ and ] to adjust the sensitivity of the bat.

Credits for most of the models in the game (the cap, baseball, cannon, and ballpark in the game) belong to Poly by Google under a CC-BY license. https://poly.google.com/
